lead_paragraph: It is easy enough for Congress to appropriate funds, but the real economic problem of defense is one of material and labor resources -- and Time. This is what the House ought to bear in mind when the War Department Appropriations Bill, carrying a total for the coming fiscal year of $9,452,000,000, comes before it this week.
abstract: ed on non-integration and planning in program
